member.name: T:ScriptableObjectUtility.ScriptableObjectUtils
member.summary: Provides functionality to create ScriptableObjects for ScriptibleValues types

member.name: M:ScriptableObjectUtility.ScriptableObjectUtils.SaveWithFilePanel(UnityEngine.ScriptableObject)
member.summary: Opens save file paned for path to save ScriptableObject
member.param: ScriptableObject to make an asset from.
member.returns: Unique asset path ot generated asset path by GenerateUniqueAssetPath

member.name: M:ScriptableObjectUtility.ScriptableObjectUtils.SaveScriptableObject(UnityEngine.ScriptableObject,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Saves a ScriptableObject to the Assets/Resources folder if
path obtained from Selection.activeObject is NULL
NOTE: The folder path Assets/Resources will be created if it does not exists.

member.param: ScriptableObject to make an asset from.
Weather to select to newly created asset
member.returns: Unique asset path ot generated asset path by GenerateUniqueAssetPath

member.name: M:ScriptableObjectUtility.ScriptableObjectUtils.SaveScriptableObject(System.String,UnityEngine.ScriptableObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves a ScriptableObject to the required path.
member.param: ScriptableObject to make an asset from.
Weather to select to newly created asset
member.returns: Unique asset path ot generated asset path by GenerateUniqueAssetPath

member.name: T:ScriptableObjectUtility.Legacy.ScriptableObjectUtils
member.summary:
Provides functionality to create ScriptableObjects for ScriptibleValues types
Use this method for Unity 4.5.2 and below
